title: If the cost of a book is 3 times the cost of a pen and the total is SH2400, what is the cost of each item? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cost of Pen = x cost of book is 3 times pen = 3x x + 3x = SH2400 4x= SH2400 x = SH600 = cost of pen 3x = SH1800 = coat of book

Lets suppose that the cost of pen = x and Cost of book = 3x ( 3 times the cost of pen) Add cost of book and pen so that we have 2400 x + 3x = 2400 4x = 2400 x = 2400/4 x = 600 (cost of pen) Cost of book will be 3(600) = 1800 To confirm the answer put the value in equation 600 + 1800 = 2400
